means: 使（某事物）简单[简明]，简化( simplify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Millions of people want new, simplified ways of interacting with a computer.
sentence.Network_cn: 数以百万计的人们想要新的简化方式实现人机交互。

sentence.Network_en: Last night, the president presented a shorter, simplified version of his speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨晚，总统发表了一番更加简短明了的演讲。

sentence.Network_en: The application forms have now been simplified.

PerfectNetExp.abs: CAN understand the general meaning of a simplified textbook or article , reading very slowly ., 阅读速度缓慢 , 但能读懂简易版的书籍及文章大意.

simple resuscitator 简易复苏器simplified microtome 简易切片机simplify 简化

entry.def: If you simplify something, you make it easier to understand or you remove the things which make it complex.

example.ex: ...a plan to simplify the complex social security system...
example.tran: 简化复杂的社会保障体系的计划

example.ex: He reduced his needs to the minimum by simplifying his life.
example.tran: 他过上了一种简单的生活，将自己的需求降到最低限度。

sentences.sentence: "a useful if somewhat simplified classification system"

auth_sentence.content: Mr Gheit offers a simplified calculation to illustrate this.

auth_sentence.content: Other events are simplified until they become meaningless.

auth_sentence.content: Simplified but actually, your food IS burned!
